Control Name: OPS 6.6 Deploy frequent, small, reversible changes
Control Statement: Use frequent, small, and reversible changes to reduce the scope of a change. This results in easier troubleshooting and faster remediation with the option to roll back a change.

control_attributes.Control: OPS 6.6 Deploy frequent, small, reversible changes
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you mitigate deployment risks?
